title: Simulation-Based Advanced Medical Knowledge Transfer Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Understanding of Biological Processes
context.additional_context: Performing diagnostic simulations in a VR environment and strengthening multidisciplinary case analysis.

learning_goals: Learners apply at least three clinical contexts in VR simulations and perform diagnostic reasoning processes with 80% accuracy.
Learners can integrate and apply at least two medical principles to propose solutions for complex symptom cases.
Learners improve knowledge transfer ability by over 70% by utilizing deep learning strategies in new clinical scenarios
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
